thread.title: BRIEF-Third Point Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.42

title: BRIEF-Third Point Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.42
text: February 28, 2018 / 9:31 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Third Point Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.42 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Third Point Reinsurance Ltd: * THIRD POINT RE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 EARNINGS RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.42 * THIRD POINT REINSURANCE - BOARD AUTHORIZED REPURCHASE OF ADDITIONAL $148.3 MILLION SHARES * QTRLY GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN $164.2 MILLION VERSUS $80.8 MILLION * QTRLY NET PREMIUMS EARNED $129.5 MILLION VERSUS $192.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
